Key Match Events: The Astros scored four runs in the eighth inning to take the lead
The Royals scored three runs in the seventh inning to take a 3-2 lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jason Heyward made a splash in his Astros debut with a two-run double
Others: Hunter Brown pitched well for the Astros, allowing two hits and no earned runs in 6 2/3 innings
Bobby Witt Jr., who leads the American League in hits, batting average and runs, went 0 for 4
